description: Knopfmacher expansion of sqrt(2): a(2n)=2(a(2n-1)+1)^2 - 1, a(2n+1)=2a(2n)^2 - 2.
references: A. Knopfmacher and J. Knopfmacher, "An alternating product representation for real numbers", in Applications of Fibonacci numbers, Vol. 3 (Kluwer 1990), pp. 209-216.
author: Arnold Knopfmacher [ ARNOLDK(AT)gauss.cam.wits.ac.za ]
extensions: More terms from _Christian G. Bower_, Jan 06 2006
